mapper.insert:
insert into designer_works
user_id, pic_ids, area, title, works_description, pic_id, creator, sys_code, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, project_time, is_deleted, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark,
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT d.user_id,u.user_name,d.gmt_create,u.company_address,u.company_tel,u.idcard_verify_state,u.intro,u.qq,d.project_time FROM designer_works d LEFT JOIN sys_user u on d.user_id = u.id and u.is_deleted = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND d.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT d.id,d.title,d.area,d.gmt_create,d.pic_ids,d.works_description,d.project_time FROM designer_works d LEFT JOIN sys_user u on d.user_id = u.id and u.is_deleted = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND d.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT r.pic_path AS picPath FROM designer_works d LEFT JOIN res_pic r on d.pic_ids = r.id WHERE 1=1 AND r.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT r.pic_path AS picPath,d.id,d.title,d.user_id,d.area,d.pic_ids,d.pic_id,d.works_description,d.project_time FROM designer_works d LEFT JOIN res_pic r on d.pic_ids = r.id WHERE 1=1 AND d.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
